title: malzahar needs buffs
body: He's in serious need of love, maybe quadruple the voidlings, and have them have a 6000-8000 radius to chase with. Without that, what does he have? In his current weak state, it's so much fun to play against him. He's been at the very bottom of the win rate stats at a measly 55% for 3 patches now!  He seriously could use a lot more voidlings, reproduce and multiply! Maybe some logarithmic thing...
